CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sector Beta relative to Crimson Quarter?
SRP.A: Sector Beta is {below} Crimson Quarter in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Ward relative to Outer Rim Settlements?
SRP.A: Verdant Ward is {above} Outer Rim Settlements in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Enclave relative to Verdant Ward?
SRP.A: Azure Enclave is {below} Verdant Ward in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sector Beta}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Verdant Ward}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Verdant Ward's minimum Vaccination Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Verdant Ward's minimum Vaccination Rate is in {1957}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Quarter's maximum Vaccination Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Quarter's maximum Vaccination Rate is in {1962}.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1964, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1953 and 1963?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 1962 and 1964 was {larger} than between 1953 and 1963.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1962, was the average total Vaccination Rate higher or lower than between 1957 and 1962?
NC.A: The average total vaccination rate between 1953 and 1962 was {higher} than between 1957 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1963, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1954 and 1962?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 1962 and 1963 was {smaller} than between 1954 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1964, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1957 and 1958?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 1958 and 1964 was {larger} than between 1957 and 1958.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Sector Beta} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Outer Rim Settlements and Crimson Quarter first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Outer Rim Settlements and Crimson Quarter first exchanged leading positions in {1956}.
